thread.title_full: Time to end “gun free zones” by families of victims suing the college and moron officials, who did not provide security | Obama Birthplace Controversy

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Time to end “gun free zones” by families of victims suing the college and moron officials, who did not provide security | Obama Birthplace Controversy
text:
(Before It's News)
Today college education is extremely expensive. The cost of tuition should provide meaningful security. Oregon college with only 1 unarmed guard for 3,000 students is a joke, this is a total lack of security. White House is not a gun free zone, Capitol is not a gun free zone. There is an extremely tight security in every federal building. There has to be a meaningful security in colleges as well.
Colleges will not provide security until and unless they are sued by the families of victims for negligence.
Shooting at Oregon community college campus…
SHOOTER IDENTIFIED….
POLICE: 10 dead…
‘Gun-free campus’…
One ‘security guard,’ unarmed…
State had recently tightened gun laws…
